response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking out the prawn from the fridge. The prawn is now in the robot's inventory. The next step is to take out the butter from the fridge.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take out the butter from the fridge
(4) Close the fridge
(5) Turn on the stove
(6) Cook the prawn on the stove
(7) Turn off the stove
(8) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(9) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Take out the butter from the fridge
    butter = registry(env,"butter_208")
    EasyGrasp(robot, butter)
    donothing(env)
